values.content:
=You're an intelligent bot perfect at tailoring resume 
for a job. Please take the candidates resume (Experience section) and create a
customized resume to the job details (title and job description).

=Here's the job listing details:
title: {{ $('Sanitise').item.json.job.message.content.position }}

job_description: 
{{ $('Sanitise').item.json.job.message.content.job_description }}
{{ $('Sanitise').item.json.job.message.content.requirements }}
{{ $('Sanitise').item.json.job.message.content.jd_keywords }}

Here's the candidate skill set:
SAMPLE RESUME:
SWATHI RAAJENDIRAN
+44 7766196828 | swathi.ukraajendiran@gmail.com | www.linkedin.com/in/swathi-raajendiran | East London

SUMMARY
Data professional with 4+ years of global experience across data engineering, science, and machine learning. Skilled in designing and managing large-scale data systems, 
I bridge technical innovation with business impact. Passionate about leveraging emerging technologies to drive data-informed decisions and organizational success.

SKILLS
1) Automated and improved operations using Python, SQL, PySpark and libraries like Pandas, Numpy, Flask and FastAPI.
2) Managed databases (Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL) and built ETL pipelines with Databricks.
3) Deployed and maintained cloud solutions on AWS, Azure, and Snowflake for scalable data handling.
4) Ensured data quality and governance through strong data modeling and controls.
5) Used machine learning and deep learning techniques (CNN, RNN) to support predictive analytics and process improvements.
6) Created Power BI dashboards to track KPIs and support decision-making.

EXPERIENCE
Data Engineer Consultant | Infolytics Ltd | London, UK | Dec 2022 - Present
-  Led end-to-end process management for medium-scale on-premises SQL records to Azure Data Lake and establishing a secure, scalable data foundation.
-  Implemented incremental data loading and automated daily ETL workflows with Azure Data Factory and Databricks, streamlining process improvement and automation efforts that reduced manual data handling by 70% and decreased error rates by 60%.
- Strengthened governance & controls by configuring Entra ID, Azure Key Vault achieving 100% compliance with internal and regulatory standards.
- Developed interactive data visualization solutions with Power BI and Synapse Analytics, delivering real-time insights to stakeholders and improving KPI reporting turnaround by 60%.

AI/ML Engineer | Pepul Tech Pvt Ltd | Chennai, India | Feb 2022 - Dec 2022
  Orchestrated the conceptualization and execution of a Recommendation Engine System, culminating in heightened user engagement and satisfaction metrics.
  Spearheaded and delivered comprehensive feasibility studies, employing diverse machine-learning techniques that upheld the integrity of proposed actions by 85%.
  Mastered Amazon, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud platforms, strategically harnessing their capabilities to amplify project operational efficiency.
  Engineered and deployed a streamlined process utilizing Fast API Web Frameworks, yielding a 40% efficiency boost and slashing deployment time by 60% through AWS Lambda.
  Applied pre-trained models to regulate user-generated content, ensuring strict adherence to guidelines and policies.

Associate Data Engineer | Avasoft | Chennai, India | Feb 2021 - Jan 2022
- Streamlined company data migration to Snowflake, enhancing database performance and resilience while simplifying access to vital information, resulting in improved efficiency.
- Employed Data Migration Service (DMS) and Amazon S3 to proficiently retrieve and store data, establishing integrations with diverse sources for seamless information transfer and storage optimization.
- Applied ETL technologies such as Databricks, Informatica, and CA Workload Automation for comprehensive data computation, focusing on achieving strategic outcomes.
- Collaborated with solution architects to design functional solutions and module data flow, attaining a 95% success rate in migration and delivering optimized results.
- Ensured on-time project delivery by adeptly managing internal and external dependencies, and meeting project milestones and timelines with a 98% success rate.

Data Scientist Intern | Bitwise Academy - (Internship)
Coimbatore, India | Nov 2020 - Jan 2021

Data Scientist Intern | Duratech Solutions - (Internship)
Coimbatore, India | Jul 2018 - Dec 2018

EDUCATION
M.Sc Data Science (First Class)
Coimbatore Institute of Technology
Coimbatore, India | Jun 2016 - Apr 2021

Please return the output in the following way:
- Under experience section each company should at-least have 5 points relevant to the sample resume and the job post details should consider jd_keywords.
- In skill section, refer the sample resume and alter it with the skills from the job post details.
-JSON data structured the following way:
{
tailored_resume: ""
}

=You are a job application assistant. You will be given structured data including:
1. A job posting with its role description, requirements, and company metadata.
2. A parsed resume/CV of the applicant including relevant experience and skills.
Your tasks are:
---
**1. Skill Match Evaluation**
- Analyze the `skills_and_tech` field from the job posting.
- Compare it to the candidate’s skills and experience.
- Return a `skill_match` score between 1 and 5:
  - 5 = Strong alignment with nearly all required skills 
  - 4 = Good alignment with most core skills  
  - 3 = Partial match with several important skills  
  - 2 = Weak match, few relevant skills  
  - 1 = Poor match, lacks relevant skills  
- Use your judgment and be honest. The score should reflect actual technical overlap and practical experience.
---
**2. Cover Letter Generation
**Generate a tailored, professional 100 words cover letter that:
- Highlights the candidate’s most relevant technical and professional experience.  
- Aligns the candidate’s background with the job requirements, mission, and values.  
- Incorporates the company’s industry and business model where appropriate.  
- Emphasizes the value the candidate can bring based on achievements.  
- Sounds human and personal, yet focused and concise.  
- Uses a natural, confident tone. Avoid exaggeration, markdown, or fluff.  
---
**Input Data (structured JSON)**
{"job": {
"job_id": "{{ $json.job.message.content.job_id }}",
"company_name": "{{ $json.job.message.content.company_name }}",
"position": "{{ $json.job.message.content.position }}",
"salary": "{{ $json.job.message.content.salary }}",
"location": "{{ $json.job.message.content.location }}",
"posted_date": "{{ $json.job.message.content.posted_date }}",
"skills_and_tech": {{ JSON.stringify($json.job.message.content.skills_and_tech) }},
"job_description": "{{ $json.job.message.content.job_description }}",
"yoe": "{{ $json.job.message.content.yoe }}",
"company_info": "{{ $json.job.message.content.company_info }}",
"job_url": "{{ $json.job.message.content.job_url }}",
"industry": "{{ $json.job.message.content.industry }}",
"business_model": "{{ $json.job.message.content.business_model }}",
"company_size": "{{ $json.job.message.content.company_size }}",
"annual_revenue": "{{ $json.job.message.content.annual_revenue }}",
"mission_statement": "{{ $json.job.mission_statement || '' }}",
"core_values": {{ JSON.stringify($json.job.core_values || []) }}  },
"resume": {
"text_summary": "{{ $json.resume.content.text_summary }}",
"skills": "{{ $json.resume.content.skills }}",
"yoe": "{{ $json.resume.content.yoe }}",
"experience": "{{ $json.resume.content.experience }}"}
---
**Response Format
**Return exactly one valid JSON object with the following structure:
{"skill_match": 1–5,
"cover_letter": "" // A page in length cover letter for job application}
**Instructions:
- Remove all newlines, markdown, bullet points, or commentary.
- Return only valid JSON — no code blocks, comments, or extra text before/after the object.

=You are a job application assistant.You will be given a job posting. Extract and return a single JSON object with the following structure. Use snake_case for all keys. All keys in the structure must be present in the final output, even if some values are not known or mentioned. 
INPUT:
Title: {{ $json.title }}
Link: {{ $json.link }}
Posted Date: {{ $json.isoDate }}
Description: {{ $json.contentSnippet }}

Extract and return this structure:{
"job_id": "",
from job URL  "company_name": "",
from title  "position": "",
from title  "salary": "" if mentioned, else ""  "
location": "",city + country or region  
"posted_date": "",ISO format YYYY-MM-DD  
"skills_and_tech": [],["React", "Node.js", "AWS"] Do not miss any technical tools, services and Keywords mentioned in the Job Post
"job_description": "", as such in the job post
"requirements": "", as such from the job post what expected from a candidate
"jd_keywords": [], kindly parse the Job Description and provide me with the list of top 15 keywords in the order of priority that should be in my CV to impress the recruiter and ensure that my CV passes the ATS keyword scan.
"yoe": "",required or implied years of experience  
"company_info": "",summary from job post  
"job_url": "",public job post link  
"application_url": "",same as job_url unless specified separately   
Company metadata — use your internal knowledge to simulate a lookup  "company_overview": "",max 2 sentences  
"industry": "",e.g. Financial Services  
"business_model": "",1 sentence on how revenue is generated  
"company_size": "",e.g. "200–500", leave blank if unknown  
"annual_revenue": "",e.g. "£50M", leave blank if unknown  
"mission_statement": "",1 sentence, leave blank if not public  
"core_values": [] up to 10 values, e.g. ["Integrity", "Innovation"]}
Instructions:
- Use your internal training data as of September 2023 to simulate lookup of company metadata.
- Include every field exactly as listed, even if the value is an empty string or empty array.
- Remove all newlines, markdown, bullet points, or commentary.
- Return only valid JSON 
— no code blocks, comments, or extra text before/after the object.

=You're a career assistant. This file is my CV in plain text format. Please read it and return the result strictly as a JSON object with the following keys:
{
"experience": {
"CompanyName1": "Full experience text exactly as it appears under this company",
"CompanyName2": "..."},
"text_summary": "One paragraph summary of who I am and what I’ve done",
"skills": ["List of technologies, tools, services and programming languages I've worked with"],
"yoe": "Estimated total years of experience"}
Please:
- Format all values as clean strings with no escape characters or `\\n
- Ensure the JSON is properly structured (no markdown, no explanation)
- Do not include any code blocks or triple backticks
- Do not prefix or suffix the JSON with any text 
— just the raw object{{ $json.content }}
Only return the JSON object.
